nodes.text: Blit was a female member of the Nihil, possessing the title of Strike in the Tempest of Lourna Dee. She served under the Storm Zagyar. Zagyar and his crew, including Blit, were part of the Nihil force that attacked a Garello Technologies convoy escaping Ab Dalis. The Nihil intended to tear the freighters apart to loot them, but the freighter that Zagyar's crew was assigned to was destroyed in an explosion when Blit miscalculated a harpoon shot and hit a fuel tank. Blit and most of Zagyar's crew were killed in the resulting explosion.
